title: Fintech firms disburse 2.5 crore loans in Q3, FACE reports
description: Based on responses from 28 NBFCs, 80% were profitable in the first three quarters of FY23, as opposed to 68% in FY 22-23, said the report. Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is an industry body that tracks the progress of digital loans.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
